sentences.english: The thesis presents the research and design of a V-band frequency quadrupler.
sentences.chinese: 本文對V波段有源倍頻器進行了設計研究。

sentences.english: This thesis presents the design and manufacture of a V-band frequency quadrupler.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V波段四倍頻器的設計和研製方法。

sentences.english: The phase jitter of output signal of the PLL( phase locked loop) frequency doubler is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 定量分析了數字式鎖相倍頻器輸出信號的相位抖動。

sentences.english: The frequency tripler has certain gain.
sentences.chinese: 這種三倍頻器具有一定的倍頻增益。

sentences.english: In this paper the realization approach of X-band four-frequency multiplier microstrip structure is discussed mainly.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論x波段四倍頻器微帶結構的實現途徑。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a design method of microwave active frequency-multipliers.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種微波有源倍頻器的設計方法。

sentences.english: The homogeneity and stability ofthe KTP doubler were also checked.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本實驗對KTP倍頻器的穩定性也做了檢驗。

sentences.english: This frequency multiplier may be used satisfactorily as the output-stage some velocity radar.
sentences.chinese: 這種倍頻器可以滿意地用作爲某型測速雷達的輸出級。
